text: The energy in the nucleus of atoms produce heat which can be used to generate
subject: PHYSICS

explanation.text:
Explanation
\(\frac{MA}{VR}\times\frac{100}{1}=efficiency\)

\(\frac{L}{E}\frac{1}{VR}\times\frac{100}{1}=75\)

\(\frac{1000}{E}\frac{1}{4}\times\frac{100}{1}=75\)

\(E = \frac{250 \times 100}{75}\)

E = 333.3N
There is an explanation video available below.

text: A machine whose efficiency is 75% is used to lift a load of 1000N. Calculate the effort put in to the machine if it has a Velocity ratio of 4.
subject: PHYSICS

explanation.text:
Explanation
VR = 800/200 = 4
\(Efficiency = \frac{MA}{VR} \times \frac{100}{1}\)

\(Efficiency = \frac{L}{E} \times \frac{1}{VR} \times \frac{100}{1}\)

\(Efficiency = \frac{800}{250} \times \frac{1}{4} \times \frac{100}{1}\)

= 78.74%
= 80%
There is an explanation video available below.

subject: PHYSICS

explanation.text:
Explanation
\(Stress = \frac{Force}{Area}\)

\(Stress = \frac{500}{0.2} = 2500\)

= 2.5 x 103Nm-3

explanation.text:
Explanation
Wavelength = 15cm = 0.15m

Velocity = 300m/s

V = fx

F = V/Wavelength

F = 300/0.15 Hertz

F = 2 x 103Hz
There is an explanation video available below.

text: The distance between two successive crests of a wave is 15cm and the velocity 300ms-1. Calculate the frequency.
subject: PHYSICS

explanation.text:
Explanation
Time for echo both ways = 0.8
Therefore time for echo in 1 way = 0.8/2 = 0.4

Distance = Speed x time

Distance = 340 x 0.4

Distance = 136m
There is an explanation video available below.

explanation.text:
Explanation
\(\text{Linear Magnification} = \frac{\text{Length of Camera}}{\text{Distance of the Object}}\)

\(\text{Linear Magnification} = \frac{25}{1000}\)

\(\text{Linear Magnification} = 2.5 \times 10^{-2}\)

explanation.text:
Explanation
\(\frac{1}{U} + \frac{1}{V} = \frac{1}{f}\)

\(\frac{1}{8} + \frac{1}{V} = \frac{1}{2}\)

\(V = \frac{8}{3}\)

\(V = 2.7cm\)

text: What type of reaction is represented by the equation \(^{2}_{1}X+^{2}_{1}X\rightarrow^{3}_{2}Y+^{1}_{0}n+Energy\)
subject: PHYSICS

explanation.text:
Explanation
\(\gamma = \frac{V_2 - V_1}{V(\theta)}\)

\(3(9 \times 10^4) = \frac{V_2 - 2 \times 10^4}{2 \times 10^4(30)}\)

V2 - 2 x 104 = 2 x 104 (30) x 3 (9 x 10-6)


V2 = 2 x 104 2 x 104 (30) x 3 (9 x 10-6)


V2 = 16.2 + 2 x 104

V2 = 20016.2cm3
There is an explanation video available below.
